descriptionHtml:
He was a member of an orc stronghold, but he was banished because of his extreme bloodlust and temper. He then heard about the legendary dragonborn and decided to follow you around in search for glory and maybe even reclaim his honor. You will find him at the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

I will hopefully be able to do some voice acting for him later, but not right now.

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/erikgust2
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/erikgust2
Twitter: https://twitter.com/erikgust2
author: erikgust2
